content: *perfectly portable project make one square at a time then sew together to make a colorful afghan as seen in martha stewart living january 2010 lion brand yarn * lion brand pattern # 60583ad published in lion brand yarn catalog - 2006 w skill level easy level 2 6 colors a 820-132 lion wool yarn lemongrass 4 balls b 830-112 cotton-ease berry 3 balls c 620-188 wool-ease yarn paprika 3 balls d 830-122 cotton-ease taupe 2 balls e 910-146 microspun yarn fuchsia 2 balls f 620-123 wool-ease yarn seaspray 2 balls crochet hook - size i-9 gauge one square = 5½ in 14 cm work 100 squares each 14-row square uses all yarn colors sew into strips 2 versions following assembly schematic sew strips together to make afghan 10 squares wide by 10 squares long crochet edging to finish
